document.full_text: the archdiocese of san francisco has settled 101 abuse cases and paid $68 million in settlements to survivors since 2003, but bay area victims want the church to go further.
document.title: survivors of priest abuse make proposal to church
lines_and_colors: the archdiocese of san francisco has settled 101 abuse cases and paid $68 million in settlements to survivors since 2003, but bay area victims want the church to go further.
